newsitem.title: JAPAN: Fuji TV set to apply for August listing - sources.
newsitem.headline: Fuji TV set to apply for August listing - sources.

text.p: Japanese broadcaster Fuji Television Network is likely to apply soon to list its shares on the Tokyo Stock Exchange (TSE) in early August, market sources told Reuters on Friday.
The company has informally chosen 10 lead managers for the share listing, the sources said.

A Fuji spokesman declined to comment on a target date for its planned listing. "What we can say now is that we're preparing for the listing. We cannot comment on any likely date for it," he told Reuters.
Fuji Television, which is a unit of Nippon Broadcasting System Inc, had already said it was considering listing its shares on the exchange.
